price: 49. Non, ce sont là des versets évidents dans les cœurs de ceux qui ont reçu la science. Seuls rejettent Nos versets les injustes !
arabic: بَلۡ هُوَ ءَايَٰتُۢ بَيِّنَٰتٞ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَۚ وَمَا يَجۡحَدُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَّا ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: bal huwa āyātun bayyinātun fī ṣudūri alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma wamā yajḥadu biāyātinā illā al-ẓālimūna
